Posts.Content: Aug 16, 2013 10:22PM BOSTN wrote: Honestly, I don't know why you would think that you have IBC. You have very classic, obvious signs of mastitis. Antibiotics can take a while to fully work. Mine took more than 2 days to clear up. Really, I think you should give this a few days or a week and you'll be just fine.
Posts.Title: Worried it's IBC...any advice would help :( EmmorsMom redroks2
